amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the Cross-State Air Pollution Rule portion of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 114-453 to strike the Cross-State Air Pollution Rule portion of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 224 (Roll no. 118).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 224 (Roll no. 118).
